variations.template: If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with <number:word> time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.
rts: If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with five time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.
If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with four time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.
